front: What are the current SAP UI tools?
back: SAPUI5 to implement SAP Fiori Applications, SAP Screen Personas to reduce the complexity of existing Dynpro and Web Dynpro ABAP Applications, Flexible UI Designer

front: Which of the following are best practices when developing a SAPUI5 app?

options.A: Descrbe your app using a set of metadata
options.B: Use the Synchronous Model Definition Syntax
options.C: Minimize the code in the index.html file
options.E: Use asynchronous model definition in your javascript code

front: Which control is used in the index.html file to support letterboxing if required?
From which control does the sap.m.App control inherit navigation capabilities?
When is the use of a master-detail pattern not recommended?
back: You need to offer complex filters for the master list of items, When you want to display different facets of the same object data or both

front: Which of the following aspects are true for SAPUI5 UI element

options.A: A UI element has an API
options.B: A UI element does not have a renderer
options.C: A UI element has a renderer
options.D: A UI element can have events

front: Which of the following statements are true with regard to OPA5?

options.A: Can be used for user interaction tests
options.B: Can be used for SAPUI5 integration tests
options.C: Is a view controller test framework
options.D: Provides the possibility to test navigation

front: What method must be implemented on the back end to support deep inserts?
Which of the following describe benefits of SAP Fiori elements?

options.B: Full control of the generated code at design time

front: Which of the following SAP Fiori elements based UIs are currently available?
What types of extension/replacements are supported by SAPUI5?
back: View replacement, View modification, Replace service, Implement UI Controller Hooks

front: Which of the following are the main states of a file in GIT?
In which state are the files in GIT when a remote repository is cloned?
Which of the following statements are true about the merge functionality in GIT?

options.A: A merge deletes the content of a branch
options.B: Allows the merging of two local branches into one local
options.C: Allows integration of a branch into another branch
